name: Fitia
headline: Automated Meal Planner & Nutrition Tracking
description: Fitia is an automated meal planner and nutrition tracker for weight loss or muscle gain. Our users get personalized recipes based on their data and their local country ingredients, supported with an exclusive database of 1M foods & recipes.

founders.name: Piero Linares, Founder
founders.description: Piero has corporate experience in Business Development and M&A, with more than US$1.2 billion in executed investments. In addition to his corporate role, Piero has been passionate about nutrition and fitness research since the age of 17, which was one of the triggers for founding Fitia.

generated_description:
**Fitia: Your Smart Meal Pal**

Founded in 2019 and based in Lima, Peru, Fitia is on a mission to simplify nutrition with an automated meal planner and nutrition tracker designed for weight loss and muscle gain. Imagine having your own personal chef that understands your dietary preferences, local ingredients, and nutritional needs—all catered to you.

### What They Offer
Fitia harnesses the power of technology to provide users with personalized meal plans and recipes. Their unique algorithm takes you through a simple process where you can select your preferred foods and dietary restrictions, ensuring every meal aligns with your goals. With a database boasting over **1 million food items and recipes**, they offer more than **8,000 personalized recipes** to help you eat smartly and efficiently.

### Features to Enjoy
- **Calorie and Macro Tracking:** Keep an eye on your nutritional intake effortlessly.
- **Customized Meal Plans:** Based on your preferences, including local ingredients.
- **Shopping List Generation:** It even tells you exactly how much you need to buy.
- **Diet Flexibility:** Whether you're on a keto, vegan, or pescetarian diet, Fitia adapts to your lifestyle.
- **Motivation and Community:** Join groups of like-minded individuals who share similar food or fitness interests.

### Team & Mentorship
With a committed team of 19 and mentorship from Y Combinator Group Partner Michael Seibel, Fitia is forging its path in the fitness and health tech scene. They've tagged themselves as part of the “consumer, fitness, health & wellness” markets—areas poised for substantial growth.

### In Numbers
- Founded: 2019
- Employees: 19 
- Y Combinator Batch: S21
- Countries Available: Multiple, including Peru, the U.S., Canada, and more.
- User Reviews: Over **121,038 reviews** show a solid community satisfaction.

### Why Fitia Matters
In a world where food choices can be overwhelming, Fitia cuts through the noise, serving up personalized plans that fit directly into your lifestyle. It’s not just about eating; it’s about eating smart. If you’re looking to lose weight or gain muscle, Fitia might just be your new best friend.

If you’re ready to take back control of your nutrition with ease and smart tech, check out [Fitia](https://fitia.app/) and start your journey today!
